Posts.Content: shoey1522 wrote: Six weeks ago i had a breast abscess that went away with antibiotics.  Sent me for an ultrasound and mammogram.  The ultrasound report came back a Category 5 and I am scheduled for a u/s biopsy this thursday.  Just wondering if anyone else has had an abscess that was caused by cancer.  I am 44 years old and Not breastfeeding.  The abscess was on the outer edge of the right breast under the arm. Take Care and God Bless!

Posts.Content: May 11, 2011 06:52PM shoey1522 wrote: Thank you for the information.  I will call them as soon as possible.  I am a nervous wreck and the Doctor that send my for the biopsy and the most uncaring and unsupportive staff that I never want to walk into his office again!  They never bothered to call me with my results.  The hospital that did the ultrasound was concerned that I hadnt been in for a biopsy so they called me!  They were completely shocked that the doctor never even discussed my results with me.  After the hospital called me, I called the doctors office.  Made me wait 3 days to come in the talk to the doctor then left me in the waiting room while he saw all his other patients.  Over 2 and 1/2 hours.  By then I was so pissed I didnt even ask any questions.  So I have absolutely no idea what is going on.
